content.detailedDescription: Not sure about this since i didn't notice it when i took the picture, i was focusing on the moon but just saw it as i downloaded it.  didn't think much of it till i saw the post from nj with the same thing.
content.summary: Santo domingo

content.detailedDescription: While i was driving out of my apartment complex to go observe the super moon, i looked up on the sky and noticed a cluster of red lights. i was facing south, when i noticed them in the sky. there was approximately 8 lights close together moving slowly towards the west but in different speeds. my first thought was that they were maybe helicopters, but they were too close together, and the lights weren't flashing like an aircraft. i kept starring, and noticed that they were slowly disappearing one by one until there were none. when they disappeared, the sky was clear and no clouds were visible. it's been my first sighting,and it was about 10 seconds only, but i felt an amazing feeling inside of me and i was hoping to see them again. before i started my report, i checked to see if there was anyone else who reported seeing the same thing, and i saw that someone had taken a picture of the super moon and in the picture was a red orb identical to what i had seen. but what i saw was a couple of those same lights.
content.summary: Red lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I took several pictures of the moon tonight.  i did use a flash for this particular capture.  i have taken photos at night and have not had any artifacts appear in them.  i would dismiss this as a reflection of some sort had it not been for an event that happened about 15 years ago in another state.  a glowing, reddish orange orb flew out of the woods and came within 25 feet of where i was standing.  this orb in the moon photo looks the same.
can someone tell me if it was caused by the camera? thanks.
content.summary: Odd artifact in photo of moon

content.detailedDescription:
On july of 1998 i was visiting my aunt in dallas, texas with my wife, 5 year old son and my mother. we were driving to the alamo in san antonio for an outing with my aunt sitting next to me, and my wife, mom and son in the back. half way there, my son needed to make a pit stop. we pulled over on the side of the road and i took him a bit into the woods to pee. after he was done we were making our way back to the van when i caught a strong smell of a sweet, cinnamon-like scent. i immediately froze and instantly had a recollection or flashback of an incident that was too realistic to be a dream. images flashed back of when i was back in the mother land (somewhere in central america). i was about 5 years old and i was playing hide and seek outside at night with my older brother and grandfather. the area where we used to live was next to the woods which stretched a long way. i used to squeeze between the barbed wire fence to hide deeper so they wouldn���t find me. as i was hiding behind a tree i suddenly saw a translucent soft blue light behind me. as i stood up i could see my shadow in front of me against the tree and the light engulfed me. it felt like i was floating in jell-o. i remember someone helping me into a chair with what felt like seatbelts. i remember going straight up and feeling weightless. i was inside a clear bubble looking down at the land. i could see and hear my brother and grandfather shouting for me. i kept screaming ���i am up here��� but they could not hear me. i felt the sensation of rocking back-and-forth like in a rocking chair. i was able to see the rooftops of all the houses and buildings nearby. i could feel the presence of someone next to me but i could not turn my head to look. i felt hands on my shoulders holding me down. a few minutes later i closed my eyes as i felt the sensation of falling down which made me pee on my pants. i opened my eyes and was back behind the tree i was hiding. the whole incident could not have been more than a few minutes. when i went inside my house i got the beating of my life for disappearing and peeing on my pants. they told me they had been looking for me for almost two hours. i told everyone about my ordeal but they did not believe me. i even drew pictures of the seat and bubble i was in. i could not read yet so i drew letters of what i saw on top of the corrugated steel roof tops of some of the buildings ���bolanos.��� 

my son and i got back in the van and started to drive off. i told my aunt (who is only 2 years older than me, i���m 49 now) what just had happened to me. she kept quiet for a while and eventually told me she had had similar experiences and never told anyone. unlike me she has remembered all along. to this day at times we can both predict near future events like de ja vous. as we kept driving to the alamo, we both predicted there would be a red kenworth 18-wheeled truck with the letters ���pinto��� on the side, and that it would be on the side of the road with the back wheels on fire. thirteen years later (today) and my wife still insists it was a prank we played on her and my mom.
content.summary: Total recall, flashback, recollection

content.detailedDescription:
It's been appearing a few times during the past ten days. it's cigar-shaped, with something like a ball in the middle. it glows yellowish-orange, like fire, and moves fast. sometimes it emits sparks. a few times it came very close, and seemed to be witht the size of a car. other times it can be seen in the distance as a very big yellow star that moves, then stops, sometimes changes direction. before it disappears, it blinks a few times, as with each blinking it becomes smaller.
a source whom i can trust informed me that such objects belong to the military.
i don't mention the city where it's seen on purpose. i still don't have any pics of it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A cigar shaped object glowing yellow and emitting sparks

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 8 and 9pm arizona time, i  went out back to have a smoke. my husband decided to stay in. since i was alone i decided to get my binocculars and gaze at the beautiful full moon. there were patchy streaks of clouds passing the moon. the clouds were not very dense and i could clearly see the features of the moon through them.  as i was gazing, i saw a small black shape to the east of the moon. i blinked a few times,  as i thought perhaps it was an optical illusion.  the black shape appeared triangular. the object was flying within the clouds. it was very close to the moon but did not pass in front of the moon.   a few seconds later i then saw the black object come from just below the moon on the lower east side and sweep across to the west side of the moon.  the cloud it was in was brightly lit by the moon. the object stayed within the halo of light around the moon. i could still clearly see crators on the moon.  after the object swept just below and to the other side of the moon i was able to see it for a good 5+ seconds. at this moment the shape of it appeared more elongated. when it reached the western side below the moon it made a short upward sweeping motion and rotated at the top of the upward sweep. as it rotated it then swept back downward and slightly westward. it started to level back out, still just below the moon, then it was just gone.  for size referance... using a quarter as the full moon, the black craft first looked to be  the size of a pencil lead tip viewed straight on.  then as it turned it was the size of the pencil lead viewed from the side. i would not of seen the object if i wasn't using binocculars.  the object looked solid and had a sharp contrast against the lit cloud.  i watched a little longer and kept going back out but never saw it again.   
  
 there is one other odd thing, a few min after the object dissapeared a military jet came from the directon of luke afbase and crossed directly in front of the moon. it was going faster than other planes in the sky and was headed east. the jet was not flying on any of the usual air trafic routes.
content.summary: Watching clouds as they passed full moon, saw a dark triangle near moon.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the passenger seat of my fiancee's car.  we were literally 10 feet from pulling into our driveway when a green light from the drivers side caught the corner of my eye.  it resembled a "glow stick" or fireworks which was my first thaught as to what it may be.  the only problem is that it was falling downward on an angle, at a very fast speed and started from very high up.  i turned my head and moved my neck to see around my fiancee's head and out her window, but the object was gone.  my fiancee immediatly asked "you seen that too?"  i said yes.   she, however, seen a differnt color, a discription she was so firm on that it almost sparked an argument, because i am sure the object was green.(is that common in sightings?)  before an arguemnt happend though, we turned the car around and drove up the road a little to the point where we both agreed the object may have touched gound.  of course there was nothing there and we just went home for the night.   though i have held an intrest in ufo from youth, my fiancee has not and imeadiatly dismissed any supernatural origins.  i only come forward now after watching an episode of the series "ufo's over earth" in which mufon investigates a "flap" in bucks county,  something i was completly unaware  of until watching this tv show.  i figure any info at all may help you guys
content.summary: Green flash shooting downward from sky

content.detailedDescription: Last night 3/18/11 i was taking pics of super moon in my back yard.The pictures we got back were very strange indeed .You tell me?Is there something wrong with my camera or are we looking at something we don't understand.These things were not seen with naked eye only with the camera.Please look at the two green lights near moon along with the strange orbs.Here are a couple of the pics.
content.summary: Taking pics of super moon got back strange pics of oval orbs and strange green lights

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11:pm there was a loud noise that sounded like a loud wind throuh the trees or a train off in the distance but i know both these noises and it wasnt them. it lasted only a minuite that i can recal and sounded like it was above my house. and then abrubtly stoped.
but it was strange cause it didnt start off with a slow growing noise it was loud right from the start(it was as loud as a house hold sweaper) so that made me think "this is not a air craft" because there is a millitary base not far from here and it didnt sound like anything from there.
and the train tracks about 2 miles away and they dont make that kind of noise, all of the sudden like that, also i didnt hear the horns like i normally do. 

the sound did not pulsate, is was a long low hum that. i was not able to see it and i did not see any bright lights from the window. i missed it, because the sound came from my front door and by the time i got there it went back towards my room and it went west and then slowly got quite, but at the same time abrubtly stoped. 
like of some one was to turn down the volume and then the radio shut off before it got all the way quite, if that makes any scence.


other information from this morning
at about 3:00 am, one my neighbors accross from my house(unsure who) shot off at lease 30 shot with his gun. its not hunting season and he normally doesnt shoot his gun its my other neighbors that do.
5 am a cop had his lights on and was looking for something, he didnt have any one pulled over and was near the bridge by my house.

next time it happends im recording the sound, it was so out of place.
content.summary: Loud humming noise did not sound like known aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I watched a red ufo shape shift and mimic a airplane or helicopter for close to two hours starting at 6:55 pm cdt on the night of 3/14/2011 in forest park near chicago. it flew in a w, n, e, s rounded off square pattern in the sky and the lights would change color and configuration the sound of the craft flying over head changed to. search *(link moved to additional evidence section-cms/sg) on youtube for the video. i attached some enlarged and enhanced to see better still frame photos from the video. pic number 3 looks like the ufo flew off the mayan calendar. the images are quite remarkable imo. if it was a helicopter is sure was quiet and if it was a plane it did not have the proper required faa aircraft lighting. it was around for a while so i am sure other people saw it i just don't think they knew what they were looking at since it tried to fake and perpetuate itself as a regular airplane. the ufo may have been searching for something by how it moved. hopefully someone else saw it and report it as well. 2012 is getting close from the looks of it these things will be getting closer as they show more frequently. thanks for reading.
content.shape: Chevron,   Diamond,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: Hd photos and video red shape shifting red ufo chicago 3/14/11

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend driving at night from middletown, iowa to burington on route 34 east when we saw bright lights in the sky to the south. they seemed relatively close because they were so large and bright, and low in the sky. the object seemed to turn and we saw more lights that made it look like it was a huge v shaped craft with 3-4 lights in a straight row on each side of the v. we tried to follow it by getting on route 61s and heading toward airport but we lost sight of it due to trees. we drove all the way to the airport and parked and watched to see if it would reappear and it didn't.

when we first saw it we thought it was some sort of airplane, but the way it hovered made that impossible. so we considered it might be a helicopter but when it turned and we saw the v shape we both agreed it must be a ufo.

i was excited, not afraid. my friend seemed to share my excitement but may have been scared. we both wanted to follow it.

when it turned south it moved slowly then increased speed but was still not going very fast. we were able to see it for nearly 10 minutes from first sighting when we pulled onto shoulder for about 5 minutes, then as it moved and we followed it for what seemed like 5 minutes or so.

it was 20 years ago so i am not totally sure about the date and time.
content.summary: Driving on rt. 34e looking s toward airport saw string of 3-4 large lights floating in sky, rotated and headed s toward airport showing more lights and v shape

content.detailedDescription: Was on computer dogs wouldnt stop barking, went out side to tell em to shut the hell up then noticed these 6 likes in the sky so i took a picture with my cell phone, didnt look like plane lights thats why i took picture.
content.summary: 6 lights

content.detailedDescription:
I had finished mowing grass and as i came out the door i wanted to look toward the sunset, which was long gone except for a few very high thin clouds. it was only starting to get dusky dark when i noticed it. i thought it was in space or very high until it went under the clouds. it was not a refection from a plane; it did'nt even look like one. no wings; absolutly no sound at all, but close enough that there should have been. it was shaped like a big cigar, just like one! it kept changing colors like a firelog glowing ember like. i was facinated by it for some reason, because it did'nt dawn on me right away that somthing was'nt right. it was going way too fast for there to be no sound. i don't drink or do drugs, so no hallucination's. i thought it to be very pretty. i've never seen anything like it before. after it left, the first thing that came into my mind was,'' well; now you've seen one too''. i thought on it for a day or two, then on the third day i seen it coming back and that time it was night; same thing, only this time it was moving faster than anything i've ever seen fly! no sound. after you could have counted to about ten, there were two military jet's giving chase. after they went by you sure could hear a boom! 
 i've always thought there were other civilization's out there, but why wuold they even want to come here! mostly just war and corruption; probably think it might be catching, like a sickness or something. i can't see what we'd have to offer them. if they can come here from out there, they'd be so far ahead of us; it would be like us watching grass grow. but if thier there[ and i know they are now], god made them too. maybe he's told them to leave us alone; maybe they can watch and that's all. when i saw that report about the sighting's that fall, i knew then that i'd seen it to. i live in the country with not a lot of streetlight's and the like to block the starlght view. i was 46 when i saw that. i've been a star gazer since i was a kid. seen a lot of stuff; but nothing like that!!!
content.summary: Cigar shaped, entire thing glowed, changing firelog like orange/red

content.detailedDescription:
On a late summer eve. about 11-12 pm i was walking back to my campsite on
a 67 acre ranch my friend owns,i had to walk out into the open pasture from the trees we were sitting under having a cook out,when i walked out from there into the open i notticed what a clear night it was & you could see all the stars clearly.I walked about another few steps when i looked up again i noticed a spotlite what looked to be a helicopter because it was hoovering,mabey 500-700 ft up.Then a few seconds and it started moving up &
the lite flashed,real bright,the brightest whitest lite i ever  seen.It then took off at super fast speed up,i followed it this whole time till it was up there with the stars,but it was brigter than the stars. it took about 4 seconds to get up there,straigt up! i lost sight of it as the lite turned into such a small dot passing stars and disapering into space.
i was in total shock and pinched my self and rubbed my eyes.My friends were less than 100 ft away but it happend so quick i could not react.
i did not report it till now,but the local paper had ufo report around that time.I hope other people saw this that night,it was a ufo or gov, project,faster than the space shuttle by 1000%. 
both my grand fathers worked for nasa in the cape,in florida,they said ufo would come to the base & hoover and take off a unfavnable speed. one was
described as the shape of an airplane wing,perfecly smooth & metalic.
the people that work for nasa have had many experiances.My family from the space coast & many familiys talk about ufo activity there.
content.summary: Walking on ranch in open pasture when above me to the n/w   a bright light  appered to be helicopter spotlight then took off straight up at super hi-speed to the stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was southwest bound on pearl road and coming to a stop at the intersection of pearl road and ridge road on my way to parma general hospital when i noticed through the front windshield fast moving lights from the east/southeast moving west/northwest that seemed much too low to the ground for the speed at which they were moving.  i live in this area and am quite familiar with what is usually in the sky.  i saw three large white lights with a yellow hue that were perfectly circular flying at what seemed to be a high speed, but were, again, very low to the ground (200-300 feet?).  i thought at first the object was a plane, but this was too low and too close to be a plane, plus there were no wings or any other discernible structure.  i then thought helicopter, but i saw no blinking lights or colored lights of any kind, heard no noise when i rolled down the windows (though i did not think to roll down the windows until object was out of sight).  the flight pattern was smooth and level, did not seem to be descending or ascending.  i looked to see if the driver in front of me was also looking at these lights, but could not tell if the driver noticed them.  sighting ended when the object flew over houses & trees.  the lights were not equidistant from one another either, the back two lights seemed to be a bit closer to one another and a bit farther away from front light on the triangle.  my feelings included surprise, disbelief, then awe & wonder, then denial, then acceptance.  it was eerie to see the lights so close to the ground, moving so quickly and being so close to me, especially in such a heavily populated area.  others must have seen this object.  the sighting was short, however, so it was fairly easy to put it out of my mind and carry on with my day.  nevertheless, here i am writing a witness report about the sighting.
content.summary: Three yellowish-white circular lights in shape of triangle

content.detailedDescription: I got off work and driving home when i saw the object the sky. it was very shiny and metallic looking. it wasn't a plane or helicopter because it would change colors and it was as if it was following me. as i was driving i kept staring at it and almost made me have an accident by running off the road. i then decided to park my vehicle on the side of the road to get a better look. it then disappeared out of sight. the shape of the object was like that if a star and would not move anywhere just float in the air. it kind of scared me but i was really curious about it thats why i stopped to get a better look. and also it was very close to land when i saw it.
content.summary: Very shiny metallic looking objecy changing in color floating

content.detailedDescription:
At appox 730pm i was in my back yard playing with star map app on my phone and digging weeds out, when i just happen to look up and witness at first what appeared to be a group of ballons released into the sky, traveling from the south heading north. as the "ballons" approached closer, i saw no swaying movement, and saw what appered to be a soild object. due to tonight being a full moon, and as the object came closer to the moon itself, the moon light reflected off of a triangle shaped "craft". the wind a the time was coming from the west at a breeze, yet the object traveled unhindered by the wind, in a straight path, south to north. 

it is hard to exactly describe the way the light was reflecting off of the object, it was disorted and mirage-like, but the shape of a triangle was clearly visable in this small window of time viewed. as the object came closer to the moon, i could see what looked like miraged orbs along the outside of the triangle shape, wavey, much like the lights in a swimming pool, with fluxing movement. 

as the object passed the moon, all reflection was lost and the object vanished into the sky. it was as if a trick was played on my eyes when it appeared and when it vanished. the event itself lasted no longer than 5 to 7 seconds. the object made zero sound, not a humm, not a buzz, nothing. this, along with the speed at which it was moving was the most disturbing part of this whole event to me. 

i can not gauge how high the craft was, but it was most certainly not at the altitude of commercial aircraft, but more around the altitude of aircraft circling in before landing. the object was at appox 70-80 degrees overhead.

i live right outside davis-monthan afb, i was enlisted in the az air national guard for 6 yrs, and i grew up on the southside of tucson, where the tucson internationl airport is located, so i know what a plane & fighter jet look and sound like. the speed at which this object was moving is about equal to one of our ang f-16s taking off at full afterburner, which i have seen more times than i can remember. had it not been for the light of the full moon, i would not have seen this object.
content.summary: Moon lit triangular craft traveling from south to north at a high speed but making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: My friend, his brother, and i were sitting on his front porch at his house, waiting on someone else to show up. as we were waiting a police officer drove by,(from the right, heading left) and my friend and i stared at the officer, trying to determine if he was one we are familiar with. as he drove down the road where the road curves right, in the sky about two fingers above the tree line of the horizon, there was a very vibrant, large, neon green ish, square or diamond shaped, and flashing or pulsing light heading down past the trees. it was only visible for at most five seconds. however it was enough time to get one good look at it before it was out of sight. my friend and i were both suprised at what we saw. it was not visible long enough to get a picture or anything of the sort. to date, i still do not know what it could have been. i know for a fact that it did not resemble any aircraft i have ever seen. i'm sharing this with your organization only to see if you have ever incountered anything similar to: a flashing or pulsing, neon green ish, fairly large, square or diamond shaped, sighting such as this. let me please emphasize i am not implying this to be an alien craft or anything of the sort. i am unable to identify it, and cannot match its description with anything on the internet. perhaps your organization has seen something or recieved reports from the area (or even state) that fits the description?
content.summary: Brief glimpse of something i have never seen before. one other known witness. vibrant green light. shaped like a square-ish

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished watching bonanza on tv. i put our big chair back against the wall. i went down the hallway to my room. i pulled back the covers and put my dog on the bed. i turned off the light and had just started to cover myself when my dog jumped up and growled. i then heard a low whirring type sound. my dog jumped off the bed and went down the hallway.During this i heard a crackling or zapping sound. the whole room was lit up as though the light was on. i got up and looked out both windows. everything was lit up all around the house, very, very bright. i was drawn to the living room [a feeling i had to go] i went down the hallway and i stopped at the end. looking across the living room toward the sliding glass door stood someone, very tall [top of head was higher than rod at the top] completely shadowed[i could not see features] i said what do you want? no answer. i again said what do you want? here it gets confusing for me,as if i am missing pieces. time!! i next remember looking behind me at my dog and then toward my visitor. then i am in my room again. i hear the crackling sound again. then the whirring sound getting steadily louder. i then hear a vehicle and look out my window. there is a jeep with two military guys and a large spotlight in the back. one is driving and the other is directing the light. the back one points and they take off down the road. i ran to the other window but only saw the jeep go around the curve. i went to bed and pretty much just passed out. in the morning i told my dad about it and he said he would check on it. last time he ever talked to me about it. i feel at ease, not a bad experience. but something?  this has haunted me for 43yrs please help me!! i feel i want them to come back.
content.summary: Travis afb   alien encounter in my living room

content.detailedDescription: See the photo posted *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) click the of interest section at the top bar. i was living on the yakima indian reservation on a produce farm. i stayed in a house trailer and was learning auto/tractor mechanics from a person whom also stayed on the farm property. this is located at the end of slough rd. in n. wapato, wa. there were two old cars (the convertable ford is still there) that i decided to get a photo of. i do not believe in 'little voices' that people 'imagine', yet i still remember the 'warning' impulses i received while going to get the photo (don't - you will <><> not don't, etc..) i took a photo, and not until recently looked closely at it. i posted it on my website(above). it was taken on 110 film and looked like a lens or film flaw. not very big, yet, when blown up is a true ufo. the photo has the date on the back, mar 1989.
content.summary: Took a picture - the photo shows a ufo

content.detailedDescription: For a good 4 minut
content.summary: Saw top shaped ufo hovering500 feet from my car. about

content.detailedDescription:
Friday night 03/18/11 at 22:44 - 49 my daughter and i were on our way home from my grandmother's house on 77 north. as we were nearing exit 24 a white to amber star like object slowly moved across the sky then became motionless / hovering. the object was closer in relation to the stars and obviously putting off more light. at first i thought it was a star then possibly a plane, but as we drove closer it was getting bigger and there were no flashing strobes like on a plane. i was second guessing myself and almost at a point of thinking it may have been a star after all or some kind of trick of the eye when it blinked out or shot off. i thought it had either shot off or blinked out, but my daughter screamed / yelled she could see it and she was looking up and to our right out of my line of sight. the object was over us + to the right and i couldn't see it, but she could.I handed my cell to my daughter telling her to try and get a video of it as i was driving down the highway. she took my cell phone and was trying to record a video of it. i can't really see anything on the video on my cell phone because the screen is so small, but it caught our audio and us yelling.*warning* i apologize but i'm heard saying a few expletives in the background. i actually partially slammed on the brakes as we got closer and the object blinked out or seemingly zipped to the right. i didn't stop though and kept on going home. my daughter was upset and scared. i myself was kind of freaked out, but not scared more like a feeling of what the hell was that and non-belief / shock. 

   another very curious thing we noticed was there was a bunch of planes all over the place as / after this happened. when we got home and got out our car we saw a couple planes seeming to be circling around in the sky. we rushed into the house telling my wife and us three went out into the backyard. i counted no less than six planes up in the sky going in different directions criss crossing approximately where i'd say the object had been. i tried to take video of two of these planes as they were going in different directions. it was easy to tell these were planes as there was sound and there were the typical flashing strobes on them. i've never seen planes all in the sky like that above my house before, maybe one or two occasionally but the sky to me was teeming with them or possibly a few circling tonight back and forth across. as we would see two or three going one direction and a minute or so later two or three more would be circling from opposite ends of the sky.

  i am a prior military veteran who spent a year in the persian gulf as a stinger missile operator/ gunner whose job was air look out and so i have some experience identifying flying aircraft, at least in the past. i can't say what this object was it definitely was not a helicopter and did not seem to behave like a plane. one of the main reasons i am reporting this is because i am very curious to see if any others noticed this object as well, seeing as it was over a major highway. i would be more than happy to email or forward my cell phone videos. although i am not sure if any thing can be seen in it.
content.summary: Fairly bright light hovering over highway 77 north for about a min, then shot off

content.detailedDescription: My wife says i nedd to tell you folks about this. it sent a chill down my spine then as it does to type this right now. last night i went out our back door to take our pug out to do her business . i was standing in the drive way when something in the sky coming from the south caused me to look up. what i saw was beyond any thing i could comprehend . there was something with three lights in the shape of a triangle going very fast it was coming from the south going north. it went right over our house.As it got closer it slowed down.The three lights were as bright as a full moon.As it got closer i then realized this thing was huge i am getting goosebumps typing this right now. i ran to the deck and yelled to my wife to come and look at this thing in the sky.As she came out it had just gone over our house.We stood in awe and watched as it faded in the night sky to the north. as it went over i noticed there was on noise,none,erie and it was extra quit outside.Now the most chilling part of this was how big it was.I told my wife if i had to guess this thing had to be a mile wide.I know this sounds crazy but i stand by my estimate.We will never forget how this thing moved through the sky.I can only hope that other people saw this because it troubles me.It was tramatic and left me with nothing but wonder.If you must know it was very scary. i find myself going to the deck door and just staring at the night sky.Makes me wonder does our government oranother government have something this big the flys? i wish i had never seen this. thank you
content.summary: Very very large, three lights on corners, black

content.detailedDescription:
This incident occurred when i was kid approximately 1974 or 1975. i was approximately 9 or 10 years old. it was so long ago i'm not sure exactly when it occurred, i do remember school was still in, and it was warm out, so it was toward the end of the school year. 

i was with a friend of mine who i grew up with, he was a year younger than me. we grew up together in a development in warminster not far from the johnsville naval air development center that was located on jacksonville rd at street rd.

we were down in the woods at the (then) dead end of mearns rd. these woods had a large cornfield in the middle with a treeline all the way around the field that separated the field from the yards of the homes in the development that surrounded that area. 

on the far side of the woods beyond the trees and out of my sight was arch bishop wood catholic high school. this night i could hear the high school marching band was out at the school playing, i figured they were out practicing or that there was a football game going on. it was around dusk and starting to get dark, my friend and i had gotten separated in the woods as we were exploring different areas. we were supposed to be home before dark.

i was waiting near the edge of the woods where they met mearns rd. it was dusk and i knew it would be getting dark soon so i was waiting for my frined to come out of the woods when i saw a large metallic disk come out over the treetop level from my right and it slowly tracked across the sky over the field and moved from my right to my left and just slowly continued in the same direction until it disappeared out of sight. it was traveling directly toward the johnsville naval air station. 

it had round lights on the side of it that i woud compare to a porthole on a ship except they looked like lights and the disk slowly spun making the lights turn around the perimeter of the object. it had a flat shape with straight sides and the round portholes were in the sides. it wasn't spinning around very fast at all, and it wasn't moving across the sky very fast either. i would compare it in size to a tractor trailer.

i remember when i first saw it come it out of the trees that i thought it was some sort of thing related to the marching band at the high school, that they were having a football game and they were setting off some kind of fireworks or there was some sort of aircraft involved with the football game. once i could completely see the object i knew it had nothing to do with the football game.

after the object disappeared out of sight my friend came out of the woods and he was petrified. he wanted to get out of there as fast as he could and go home, and he did not want to talk about it. i asked him if he saw the object, and he said yeah, and he did not want to talk about it. he just wanted to get home. he was nearly crying.

i just wanted to talk about it to make sure he saw what i saw. i also wondered if anyone else in the neighborhood saw it, because i couldn't believe someone else couldn't have seen it since it was still light out and this thing just flew over the neighborhood.

i remember as i looked at it, i just wanted to stand there and stare at it. i was completely mesmerized by it. i wanted to go home too, but i wanted to tell my father what i saw and bring him back to the woods to show him where i saw it.

when i went home i found my father and my older sister in the kitchen i started to tell them what i saw and wanted my dad to go down to the woods with me. instead of listening to what i told them, they began to make fun of me and tease me. so after that i never really discussed it with anyone else, because i didn't want to be made a fool of.

since my friend didn't want to talk about it, i just forgot about it. when i saw the show tonight in bucks county where i grew up, it made me think about that time again.

the people on the show seemed to be in close proximity to willow grove air base. i went to my computer and went to look at a map of warminster. i looked at the area where the field used to be (its now a development) and where johnsville air base was. i looked at where the willow grove air base was and it was almost in a straight line from johnsville with that field in between. it made me wonder if that object hadn't been coming from willow grove to johnsville and went over that field on its field, but i never heard of a report of anyone else ever seeing this thing in the sky. that made me wonder if the thing just didn't rise up out of the woods and then move toward the johnsville air base. i just see it appear from over the treetops and move over the field out of sight. i had no idea where it came from or where it went to. 

i never experienced anything like this in my life, before or after. when ufo conversations came up in my life, if someone said they had seen something in their life i always remembered this incident, but i really didn't talk about it much because i didn't want to come off as some nut. i just would tell others "yeah i think i saw something when i was a kid."

i sometimes questioned if i really saw what happened that day. i never could understand why others didn't report seeing it, or why my friend was so scared and didn't want to ever talk about it. 

i also wondered if it was some project that the navy was working on at the johnsville air base. it was well known in town back then, that it was a research base for working on experimental naval aircraft, and had involvement in the u.S. space program including astronaut training.
content.summary: I saw a disc shaped object with illuminated port hole shaped windows track across the sky at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out into my moms back yard late at night and looked up in the sky and saw a huge round ship above my moms back yard. at least it looked like it was above her yard to me. it was silent and had many lights coming out of the bottom that were moving around. it was beautiful, i was amazed and just stared at it thinking that it was going to go away at any moment. i thought the object was a ufo. i told my mom the next day and she did not beleive me, she said to wake her up next time i see a ufo in her back yard, jokingly.The ufo made me fell kind of hypnotized i dont know if it was all the colors or the fact that it was a ufo. it was 10 years ago and this part is a little fogy but i think it kind of just vanished,no sound or lights just gone.
content.summary: Huge colorful disk or circle shape with a lot of colors coming our the bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out. it was dark out and i seen this bright round object in the sky. it was moving very slowly across the sky, in a funny manner. i yelled for my husband and went to get my camera. we watched it move up and down. i did get one picture then, i went back in the house to get the settings right on my new camera and when i came back outside it was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Port crane

content.detailedDescription:
This was caught on camera and was found later that evening when reviewing the photos. the object is located to the right of the falling booster rockets. in my opinion looks like a bat, at my best explanation. please let me know what you may think of it. i only added our photography name to the photo. if you would request an unedited photo, please let me know.

the photo was taken of the booster rocket separation during the shuttle launch.
content.summary: Ufo caught by mistake during booster rocket seperation during discovery launch

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room getting ready for bed after i worked the nightshift. i wanted to see how my new underwear set looked on me, so i decided to take a picture. after i took the first photo (11/29/2009 11:43 a.M.) i turned my camera around to see and i noticed some weird light patterns that were pretty intricate. so i took another, and this picture was covered in more light patterns. i ended up taking a couple more, and got more interference. 
  when i first took the pictures, i didn't think of aliens at all, i really didn't know what to make of them. i just knew that these weren't the typical light flashes you see in your pictures sometimes, the lines were too detailed. i only came to the idea that it might be alien interference in my pictures after i had a vivid alien dream over a year after i took the pictures. 
  i will only be posting one of these pictures, due to the fact that there is personal images(my face)in the others and i don't want to post them online to the public. i hope to get some feedback to what the photo analyst makes of the picture.
content.summary: Not a ufo sighting. photo with, possibly, alien and weird interference

content.detailedDescription: I look at the sky very often to see if it is a good dark sky for looking. i have a scope and binoculars and just like to look up. i went out on my deck porch behind the house and just under the big dipper's top of the pot's star, i measured about 35 degrees with a compass (afterwards), i noticed 2 star like objects linear about 2 fingers apart top to bottom moving slowly downward for about 10 to 15 seconds and then dis appearing. they were brighter then the stars that were out at the time. i never seen any thing like that in the north sky. i know the airplanes pattern which is further east, but these objects were moving in the opposite direction of the planes flight path.
content.summary: 2 bright stars ,top one brighter. vertically linear, moving slow downward.

content.detailedDescription:
Four or five of us were walking up the side walk between apartment buildings. a twelve year old little girl we were with said "what is that" and i looked up at a seventy five degree angel in the sky. they were a long width of stars three in a row on top then three in a row on bottem. the two on the right moved up then came back down in formation as i recall. after that the two on the left went up and came back down in to formation. and the middle repeated. the six moved into a straight line. and then took off in a wavy motion farther out through the stars, at speeds too fast for what normal flights could have done. 
i imidatly thought it was a ufo.
when seeing it it almost made me want to cry.
content.summary: Six circular lights did little dance and took off in wavy motion behind stars
